title: A Love of My Own 2: An Urban Fiction Romance
description: One woman, 3 men, and endless drama. What happens when a love triangle comes back to haunt? After being swept up in the whirlwind of playing the field and juggling 3 men, Simone is left with decisions to make and issues to work through.Although she had fallen head over heels in love with Mario, continuing to see Ceasar on the side had turned her life into a wreck literally and figuratively. Recovering from the near-fatal accident with the aid of her friends, Simone works to put together the broken pieces of her life.As a full-time artist, she paints beautiful pictures that brighten the room and help to subdue her pain but the internal anguish that she faces is a little more deep-seated. Depression and anxiety color her world after the wreck threatening to change everything. While trying to gain some stability and move on from Ceasar, Simone fights for her life and her love. Will she and Mario be able to repair their relationship, or did their love die in the crash?
author: Tatum James
